Constructor Detail

GridConfiguration

public GridConfiguration(boolean enableGrid,
                         int serverPort,
                         java.lang.String mediatorAddress,
                         int mediatorPort)
Creates a basic configuration for the grid module and uses the given settings.

Parameters:
enableGrid - a boolean -- true if the grid is enabled
serverPort - an int specifying the port of the server
mediatorAddress - a String containg the server address, the client wants to connect to
mediatorPort - an int specifying the port of the server
